Reviews.Title: Wrong processor
Reviews.Author: dlwaddel
Reviews.Content: This laptop is advertised to have an i5 3.1 GHz processor (http://www.amazon.com/Dell-Inspiron-i17R-1053sLV-17-Inch-Laptop/dp/B009LTUB1E/ref=sr_1_1?s=electronics&ie;=UTF8&qid;=1353674608&sr;=1-1&keywords;=i17r-1053slv), but actually has an i3 2.4 GHz processor. Argh!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice Large Screen
Reviews.Author: Anthony T "Avid Reader"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a portable in home option to a desktop.  It is very fast and the super large screen is beautiful.  However, if you are looking for a laptop to take on trips, you might want to go for a smaller, lighter option.

Reviews.Title: I love my Dell Inspiron 17" laptop
Reviews.Author: Lynette Lundborg
Reviews.Content: I love my Dell Inspiron 17" laptopCompact, fast, able to move from room to roomto use my laptop

Reviews.Title: Processor
Reviews.Author: PCJoey
Reviews.Content: Looking this over, I see it says an i3 2.4g processor. Had the pleasure of setting one of these up for a friend...now I am looking to get a couple. Nice laptop for the price.

Reviews.Title: Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Travis Michael
Reviews.Content: I love the full keyboard and wide screen. However windows 8 is a pain in the a$$ if its not on a tablet. The computer has a great sound system to it where you don't need external speakers if your at the desk with it.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and crappy
Reviews.Author: Yeah!
Reviews.Content: This is the sixth laptop (either gifts or myself) I had purchased from dell so I was happy to do so.  And it has turned out to be the worst investment I have ever made.  From now on I will never buy another dell laptop (or product) again.This "thing" is so cheaply made is  hilariously sad. It to only is cheaply made but it shows it in every piece of material and features.  Besides the disaster that is windows 8, which is volumes of horrible on its own, why should a laptop act like a tablet? I like my iPad, I like my (old) laptop. I hate windows 8.  And shame on dell for putting it on the "thing."Problems after problems when you want to use it.  On the Internet? Not for long.  While all our other laptops at home consistently stay on the Internet for hours at a time, this one disconnects at random.  Tell it to automatically detect! Sure, time after time after time.  Have a printer? Say a two year old dell wireless printer?bdoesnt like it.  The drivers are unavailable for it. After digging for hours on dells website I found a patch that allows it to intermittently work but the headache remains.Oh and let's see I've had it a month, no, almost three weeks and already it has told me the drivers have issues and cannot be repaired.  It's so "great" to use the wizard to fix it because not only does it each time find a different solution, but none of them work, ending with e screen, "ask a friend." Wow, glad that is the best help dell can offer is to phone a friend on a device that is three weeks old.I have no confidence in this product or in future products.  Each time I open it and attempt to use it, because I am stuck with it, I only get more mad at each new faulty glitch.

Reviews.Title: Returned Dell Inspiron 11R-1053s LV Laptop
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Farlow
Reviews.Content: I could not make it work.  IIt was too complex for this senior to use and it jammed up,  I had to return it.  I suggest that you need to keep it to the basics.  Way to complex for me to use.  I had to return.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron i17 1053sL 17-inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: jane
Reviews.Content: This is  good price for a computer compare with other expensive computer.  This computer has a lot space for you to save files if you do not do super lot saving files

Reviews.Title: Not my favorite laptop
Reviews.Author: P. Peralta "Texas Mom"
Reviews.Content: It seems to me the other reviewer was right and this is an i3 not i5 as stated. Plus Windows 8 SUCKS and I wish I had picked a laptop with an older operating system. The laptop itself is okay I guess but I wish it didn't have windows 8 and was the computer it was promised to be.

Reviews.Title: videocard refusal
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: Hi I bought this item and after almost 7 months It didn't turn on anymore. seems like the video card isn't working anymore and it won't start. So I want to know what can i do or can amazon do for me? cause a laptop for 6 months use and then it ain't working anymore..
